abstract: California Superior Court files charges of conspiracy and pimping a minor on Backpage.com chief exec Carl Ferrer; multiple jurisdictions throughout country have accused 12-year-old website of accepting ads that facilitate sex trafficking of children but this is first time criminal charges have been brought against Dallas-based company.

headline.print_headline: C.E.O. of Backpage.com, Known for Escort Ads, Is Charged With Pimping a Minor
headline.main: C.E.O. of Backpage.com, Known for Escort Ads, Is Charged with Pimping a Minor

snippet: Carl Ferrer and the two founders of the company, which has been accused in various jurisdictions of engaging in sex trafficking, including of children, were charged....
lead_paragraph: Carl Ferrer and the two founders of the company, which has been accused in various jurisdictions of engaging in sex trafficking, including of children, were charged.
